remarks: The property of being a finite undirected simple graph without loops. (Contributed by AV, 15-Jan-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
isfusgraclALT.v $e |- V = ( 1st ` G ) $.
isfusgraclALT $p |- ( G e. ( W X. X ) -> ( G e. FinUSGrph <-> ( G e. USGrph /\ V e. Fin ) ) ) $.
